history.proof: intros A P Q R H1 H2 x H3. qsimpl time: 2.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Included P Q -> Included Q R -> Included P R

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For Cj: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For
Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
Included = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => forall x : U, In U B x -> In U C x : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Argument U is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
Fin.R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [ |- nat]
Record Q : Set := Qmake { Qnum : BinNums.Z; Qden : BinNums.positive } For Qmake: Argument scopes are [Z_scope positive_scope]
Union_Included : forall P Q R : Ensemble ?A, Included (Union ?A P Q) R < -> Included P R /\ Included Q R where ?A : [ |- Type]
Included_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q P' Q' : Ensemble A), Included P P' -> Included Q Q' -> Disjoint A P' Q' -> Disjoint A P Q
Union_left_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Disjoint A (Union A P Q) R < -> Disjoint A P R /\ Disjoint A Q R
Union_right_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Disjoint A R (Union A P Q) < -> Disjoint A R P /\ Disjoint A R Q
Complement_Included_rev : forall (U : Type) (P Q : Ensemble U), Included P Q -> Included (Complement U Q) (Complement U P)
Included_Complement_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Included P (Complement A Q) < -> Disjoint A P Q
Intersection_Union_distr_l : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Union A Q R) P) (Union A (Intersection A Q P) (Intersection A R P))
Union_assoc : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A (Union A P Q) R) (Union A P (Union A Q R))
Intersection_assoc : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Intersection A P Q) R) (Intersection A P (Intersection A Q R))
Intersection_Union_distr_r : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A P (Union A Q R)) (Union A (Intersection A P Q) (Intersection A P R))
right_Included_Union : forall P Q : Ensemble ?A, Included Q (Union ?A P Q) where ?A : [ |- Type]
Disjoint_spec : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Disjoint A P Q < -> (forall x : A, P x -> Q x -> False)
Disjoint_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Disjoint A P Q < -> Disjoint A Q P
Same_set_spec : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set P Q < -> pointwise_relation A iff P Q
left_Included_Union : forall P Q : Ensemble ?A, Included P (Union ?A P Q) where ?A : [ |- Type]
Union_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Union A P Q v < -> P v \/ Q v
Intersection_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Intersection A P Q v < -> P v /\ Q v
Included_Full_set : forall (A : Type) (P : Ensemble A), Included P (Full_set A)
Union_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A P Q) (Union A Q P)
Intersection_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A P Q) (Intersection A Q P)
OrderedRing.Rplus_0_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n : R, req (rplus n rO) n
List.Forall2_cons : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> List.Forall2 R l l' -> List.Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l')
Intersection_Complement : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Complement A P) (Complement A Q)) (Complement A (Union A P Q))
List.Forall2_nil : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop), List.Forall2 R nil nil
Intersection_absort_left : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U), Included B A -> Same_set (Intersection U A B) B
Intersection_absort_right : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U), Included A B -> Same_set (Intersection U A B) A
Included_Empty : forall (U : Type) (A : Ensemble U), Included (Empty_set U) A
Same_set = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => Included B C /\ Included C B : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Argument U is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
Strict_Included_intro : forall (U : Type) (X Y : Ensemble U), Included X Y /\ X <> Y -> Strict_Included U X Y
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, P l
List.Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> List.Forall P l -> List.Forall P (x :: l)
Inductive Forall2 (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) : list A -> list B -> Prop := Forall2_nil : List.Forall2 R nil nil | Forall2_cons : forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> List.Forall2 R l l' -> List.Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l') For Forall2: Arguments A, B are implicit For Forall2_nil: Arguments A, B are implicit For Forall2_cons: Arguments A, B, R, l, l' are implicit For Forall2: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope list_scope list_scope] For Forall2_nil: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope] For Forall2_cons: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ _ list_scope list_scope _ _]
Included_proper : forall V : Type, Proper (Same_set ==> Same_set ==> iff) Included
OrderedRing.SOR_ring_lemma1 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt ->...-> req (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp (InitialRing.gen_phiZ rO rI rplus rtimes ropp) Ring_theory.id_phi_N (Ring_theory.pow_N rI rtimes) l pe1) (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp (InitialRing.gen_phiZ rO rI rplus rtimes ropp) Ring_theory.id_phi_N (Ring_theory.pow_N rI rtimes) l pe2)
Record SOR (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_SOR_theory { SORsetoid : Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req; SORplus_wd : forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rplus x1 y1) (rplus x2 y2); SORtimes_wd : forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rtimes x1 y1) (rtimes x2 y2); SORopp_wd : forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> req (ropp x1) (ropp x2); SORle_wd : forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y...
List.Forall_nil : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), List.Forall P nil
Union_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> SProp), (forall x : U, In U B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union U B C u -> P u
Union_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> Prop), (forall x : U, In U B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union U B C u -> P u
Intersection_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> Prop), (forall x : U, In U B x -> In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Intersection U B C u -> P u
Intersection_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> SProp), (forall x : U, In U B x -> In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Intersection U B C u -> P u

```coq
intros A P Q R H1 H2 x H3.
split.
- intros y H4. apply H2, H1, H4.
- intros y H4. apply H1, H4.
Qed.```
